attributes.title: Utterly Horrible
attributes.review: The only good part of this awful app was getting to see mike pence 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈👉👈🥺. I tried to delete it and it wiped half my data and a trump flag appeared in my yard. My hand also scared a bit where I held my phone as I used the app. 😰

attributes.title: I open the app and seen a big Orange chimpanzee.
attributes.review: I open the app just to find a Horrifying scene. 😳A orangutan with a suite🤢The bright colors of the app and the ugliness of trump made my cats girl friends son have a seizure. 😔 I will be attending be gold fishes open casket funeral because of this 😭

attributes.title: Hell no
attributes.review: This app is terrible I went on the app and it was Trump naked with a spay tan don’t recommend this app is useless I hate this app I would give it 0 stars and it show Trump killing a chicken 🐔that look just like him I am pretty sure there twins

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get some wholesome content about our lord and savior president donald j trump but was shocked to see when i opened the app a very mature image of donald trump and mike pence. i am horrified and this glitch NEEDS to be fixed or the app removed. my trump would NEVER!!!

attributes.title: negative 5 billion🤢🖕👺

It's completely disgusting and the CEO is a fat ugly gross old dictator who doesn't deserve a platform or a life!!!!! Do NOT use this app!!!!!!! f trump #settleforbiden2020

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I’m very disappointed with the app itself and believe that if TikTok is taking down this should too it’s honestly so slow does not work and very disappointing so disappointing that I am now barbs for bernie😔😹😾

attributes.title: No thanks 🤢
attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars, I would. The red, white, and blue color scheme is honestly so outdated and unoriginal, like come up with something else ugh 😒 The propaganda and merch was looking a little fash, so I couldn’t stand it. It’s a 0 for me dawg.

attributes.title: dear trumps cheeto,

Poor Melanie or whatever her name is. She cant feel it. 🤪. Oh to see without my eyes       ➖👄➖, the first time that u kissed me. R🤪R👹R👁roll💀up⬆️to2️⃣the😎party🎉wit🎈my🥵crazy😈pink😻wig💇‍♀️

attributes.title: Disgusted 🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: GARBAGE
attributes.review: honestly, i’m pretty disappointed that i can’t leave a zero star review. this is the worst app ever. the user interface is rudimentary at best and the graphics are derivative of 21st century fascist propaganda. this app should be removed from the apple store IMMEDIATELY.
